name: Asura Valley
description: In this game,You must do everything you can to defeat the king and become the new king . Then click on "The next year" to challenge your own kingdom.(The next year of the "Asura King" will inherit your skills, Enhances, Creeds, and the way you fight, and feel the mood of the NPCS you bullied last year.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1G VRAM Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
